column2: "Adjustments for time manipulation are complete. Summoning target set... to the Akashic Record."
"Harriet, you are the perfect vessel. When you become one with it, you will be born anew."
"There's nothing to be afraid of! Don't think of it as dying, think of it as being reborn."
"You will be reborn, indeed. Right down to your very soul."
"And with you, this time I will know all!"
"Brot--Luther. And then what? What after that?"
"...You would question a scholar on the value of knowledge?"
"If giving up my life would save my people, and the world we live in, I would offer it gladly."
"...But if that is not your aim, then I will not throw it away here."
"I thought your goal was to help the weak. That is the reason that I am even here as Harriet. To help the weak."
"I am here because you, and you alone, summoned me here!"
"I... summoned you? Alone? Harriet, what are you saying? I watched you die right here--"
"...Ngh, ugh! Agh...!"
"Miss Harriet! Are you injured?"
"Guardian! Miss Xiera! You're here!"
"How did you wretches find this place?"
"This place is just like what you described from your vision. That means... it was real."
"Again! Why must you show up yet again?! Always always always always getting in my way!"
"Again?"
"Is he being influenced?"
"[Loser]'s memories?"
"...It seems that way. It's just like when [Loser]'s rage peaked."
"...You're right. [Loser] is the only person who would know of something like that."
"[Loser]... [Loser]. Yes... My name is [Loser]... The Omniscient One."
"You... You accursed ARKS... You dare to hinder me not once, but twice?!"
"Xiera, take Harriet and run."
"I'll handle Dark Falz."
"Please be careful!"
